title: Watch Wawrinka on FREE Challenger TV
description: Less than two weeks removed from a runner-up finish at the ATP Challenger Tour 175 event in Aix-en-Provence, Stan Wawrinka will hope to go one step further in Bordeaux. The Swiss is competing at the BNP Paribas Primrose Bordeaux, where on Tuesday he will meet Billy Harris not before 8 p.m. local time. Fans can tune into Challenger TV to stream all ATP Challenger Tour matches live and on demand at no cost. At the Challenger 175 event in Turin, #NextGenATP teen and home hope Federico Cina will be in action against Argentine Juan Manuel Cerundolo. Eighth seed Alexander Bublik closes the day against and Italian Matteo Gigante. Watch Stan Wawrinka vs. Billy Harris in Bordeaux, France (not before 8 p.m. local time) Watch Matteo Gigante vs. Alexander Bublik in Turin, Italy (not before 7 p.m. local time) [NEWSLETTER FORM]
excerpt: Stan Wawrinka faces Billy Harris at the Bordeaux Challenger on Tuesday. Watch for free on ATP Challenger TV.

html:
Challenger

Swiss plays in Bordeaux on Tuesday

May 12, 2025

Jared Wickerham/ATP Tour

Stan Wawrinka will make his third consecutive appearance at the Bordeaux Challenger. By ATP Staff

Less than two weeks removed from a runner-up finish at the ATP Challenger Tour 175 event in Aix-en-Provence, Stan Wawrinka will hope to go one step further in Bordeaux.

The Swiss is competing at the BNP Paribas Primrose Bordeaux, where on Tuesday he will meet Billy Harris not before 8 p.m. local time. Fans can tune into Challenger TV to stream all ATP Challenger Tour matches live and on demand at no cost.

At the Challenger 175 event in Turin, #NextGenATP teen and home hope Federico Cina will be in action against Argentine Juan Manuel Cerundolo. Eighth seed Alexander Bublik closes the day against and Italian Matteo Gigante.

Watch Stan Wawrinka vs. Billy Harris in Bordeaux, France (not before 8 p.m. local time)

Watch Matteo Gigante vs. Alexander Bublik in Turin, Italy (not before 7 p.m. local time)
